\[%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{aligned} 
  y_i &\sim Normal(\mu_i, \sigma) \\
  \mu_i &= \alpha + \beta x_i  \\
  \alpha &\sim Normal(0, 20) \\
  \beta &\sim lognormal(0, 1) \\
  \sigma &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned} 
\]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={274}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c16d8ee979e8ff0ba9dee008085fd2b6]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={277}
\begin{aligned}
  K_i &\sim Normal(\mu_i, \sigma) \\
  m1: \mu_i &= \alpha + \beta_x x_i \\
  m2: \mu_i &= \alpha + \beta_z z_i\\
  m3: \mu_i &= \alpha + \beta_x x_i + \beta_z z_i \\
  \alpha, \beta_x, \beta_z &\sim Normal(0, 0.5) \\
  \sigma &\sim Exponential(1)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
